summary: Based on archaeological discoveries the documentary challenges the official stance of the contemporary scientific community on the origins of man evolving from an ape and the supposedly gradual advance of human knowledge.
cast: Charlton Heston|Richard L. Thompson|Michael Cremo|Virginia Steen-McIntyre|Carl Baugh|Dale Peterson|Don Patton|David Childress|Richard Milton|Arthur Posnansky|Neil Steede|Oswaldo Rivera|Graham Hancock|John Anthony West|Robert Bauval|Rand Flem-Ath|Irina Balabanova
title: La historia suprimida del planeta Tierra
